description: Investigate and fix pagination issues in Refine-based list views. Verify pagination is working correctly for audit logs, documents, legal queries, and other resources. Ensure nestjs-query resolvers are properly configured with paging options and frontend is correctly passing cursor/pagination parameters.
title: Fix Pagination Implementation Across All List Views

descriptionHistory.description: Investigate and fix pagination issues in Refine-based list views. Verify pagination is working correctly for audit logs, documents, legal queries, and other resources.
